document_data.mainbody:
Halamther was a wizard and one of seven High Hands in the Risen Cult of Bane in the mid-14 century DR.Dragon #362 provides an exact date for the events of Halls of the High King, which did not give an exact date within itself.
Halamther spent much of his time creating a variety of awful creatures to serve the Risen Cult of Bane. Out of all creatures he was known to mostly frequently create ju-ju zombies.
Halamther was a good friend of the cults leader Gauntather for much of his life.
